column1: #Name for a quest if there is no quest target

column2: Construct a new city in your territory.
Liberate the targetted county through war.
A new city is needed to spread our ideas. Would you like to construct a new city?
Innocent people are waiting our help. Would you like to liberate this county?
This new city will be a new fortress to fight superstition! Thank you for your help.
This county is liberated! Thank you for your help.
The liberation war ends with a white peace. The central committee is disappointed.
I will do better next time!
We are defeated by our enemies! What a shame day!
The liberation war ends with invalid casus belli. Your mission fails.
